mapper.sql: id as id , goodsNumber as goodsNumber , cardNumber as cardNumber , password as password , userId as userId , status as status , cardType as cardType , endDate as endDate , creator as creator , createDate as createDate , lastModifier as lastModifier , lastModDate as lastModDate , areaId as areaId , outputDate1 as outputDate1 , outputDate2 as outputDate2 , outputDate3 as outputDate3 , activeDate as activeDate
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO zgk_card ( goodsNumber, cardNumber, password, userId, status, cardType, endDate, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, areaId, outputDate1, outputDate2, outputDate3, activeDate ) VALUES ( #{goodsNumber}, #{cardNumber}, #{password}, #{userId}, #{status}, #{cardType}, #{endDate}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate}, #{areaId}, #{outputDate1}, #{outputDate2}, #{outputDate3}, #{activeDate} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE zgk_card
goodsNumber = #{goodsNumber},
cardNumber = #{cardNumber},
password = #{password},
userId = #{userId},
status = #{status},
cardType = #{cardType},
endDate = #{endDate},
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
areaId = #{areaId},
outputDate1 = #{outputDate1},
outputDate2 = #{outputDate2},
outputDate3 = #{outputDate3},
activeDate = #{activeDate},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE zgk_card
goodsNumber = #{map.goodsNumber},
cardNumber = #{map.cardNumber},
password = #{map.password},
userId = #{map.userId},
status = #{map.status},
cardType = #{map.cardType},
endDate = #{map.endDate},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
areaId = #{map.areaId},
outputDate1 = #{map.outputDate1},
outputDate2 = #{map.outputDate2},
outputDate3 = #{map.outputDate3},
activeDate = #{map.activeDate},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zgk_card ( goodsNumber, cardNumber, password, userId, status, cardType, endDate, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, areaId, outputDate1, outputDate2, outputDate3, activeDate ) VALUES ( #{map.goodsNumber}, #{map.cardNumber}, #{map.password}, #{map.userId}, #{map.status}, #{map.cardType}, #{map.endDate}, #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.areaId}, #{map.outputDate1}, #{map.outputDate2}, #{map.outputDate3}, #{map.activeDate} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
, id
, goodsNumber
, cardNumber
, password
, userId
, status
, cardType
, endDate
, creator
, createDate
, lastModifier
, lastModDate
, areaId
, outputDate1
, outputDate2
, outputDate3
, activeDate
FROM zgk_card
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND goodsNumber like CONCAT('%', #{condition.goodsNumber} , '%')
AND cardNumber like CONCAT('%', #{condition.cardNumber} , '%')
AND password like CONCAT('%', #{condition.password} , '%')
AND userId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.userId} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{condition.status} , '%')
AND cardType like CONCAT('%', #{condition.cardType} , '%')
AND endDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.endDate} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{condition.creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModDate} , '%')
AND areaId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.areaId} , '%')
AND outputDate1 like CONCAT('%', #{condition.outputDate1} , '%')
AND outputDate2 like CONCAT('%', #{condition.outputDate2} , '%')
AND outputDate3 like CONCAT('%', #{condition.outputDate3} , '%')
AND activeDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.activeDate} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
